The area has a cool climate all year round, particularly from Dec-Jan, when much of the area is frosty. During that period, visitors should be prepared to cope with relatively cold weather.
If coming by car on the

road (Hwy 107), turn left at an intersection around km137 (at Mae Kha Market) and proceed to Doi Ang Khang for another 25 km. It is a steep zigzagging asphalt road. Vehicles should be roadworthy and drivers experienced.

It's possible to take a
from Mae Kha to Doi Ang Khang, but departures are irregular and you'll probably need to charter it.

As there is no public transportation to or within Doi Angkhang, hiring a car is recommended.
As the road to Doi Angkhang is very windy hiring a driver is recommended if you feel uncomfortable navigating the steep hairpin turns uphill and downhill yourself.
